block.p: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL
American League OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Acquired OF Chris Denorfia from Cincinnati for two players to be named and cash considerations.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Agreed to terms with RHP Todd Coffey on a one-year contract extension through the 2008 season. Sent RHP Jared Burton from Louisville (IL) to Chattanooga (SL) on a rehabilitation assignment. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Activated C Josh Bard from the 15-day DL. Placed INF Russell Branyan on the bereavement list. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Optioned LHP Randy Keisler to Memphis (PCL). Purchased the contract of RHP Kelvin Jimenez from Memphis.
N.B.A.
LEAGUE--Fined Golden State G-F Stephen Jackson $50,000 for his conduct following an ejection from a game on April 25. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Named Lenny Wilkens president of basketball operations.
N.F.L.
CLEVELAND BROWNS--Re-signed OT Nat Dorsey to a one-year contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed CB Jason David to a four-year contract. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed OT Max Starks to a one-year contract.
N.H.L.
LOS ANGELES KINGS--Signed F Teddy Purcell to a multiyear contract.
COLLEGE

KANSAS--Announced the resignation of Earle Mosley, running backs coach, for health reasons. Named Louie Matsakis running backs coach and special teams coordinator. Announced sophomore G Brandon Rush will make himself available for the NBA draft. LSU--Announced Christie Sides, women's assistant basketball coach, will not return for the 2007-08 season. OKLAHOMA STATE--Announced junior G Jameson Curry will make himself available for the NBA draft. SAINT LOUIS--Named Rick Majerus men's basketball coach. USC--Announced junior G Gabe Pruitt will make himself available for the NBA draft.
